title: bros that massage other bros "massage therapists"
body:
I find the bros that massages other dudes to earn a livelihood really REALLY need to sort their life out. It's a disgrace to all of mankind and to manhood itself. 

In my life I had many massages all from chicks mostly from Ahri look-alike kr models(It's just the life style I live I'm scumbag). Anyhow I understand getting acupuncture done by a dude, or even 刮痧 http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gua_Sha but I would never let a bro massage handle me. How does do you lay down there and like think this bro is ABOUT TO MASSAGE me like feeling my ass etc... MASSAGE BY A DUDE A DUDEEEEEEEEEE
